Anti-NATO protesters in Montreal demand Canada withdraws from alliance  —  Anti-NATO protesters gathered again in Montreal on Saturday to demand Canada withdraw from the alliance, a day after a demonstration organized by different groups resulted in arrests, burned cars and shattered windows.
